title: Ben 10 Cavern Run v1.1.25
description:
Ben 10 Cavern Run is the hit line drawing game. A unique and fun platform game where you draw your way to victory!

Dr Animo has escaped from prison using an army of giant ants! Draw lines, walls and ramps to guide Ben through Plumber HQ, the Giant Ant Hill and Dr Animoâ€™s secret base and get ready for a final showdown with the Ant King.

Draw platforms to run across gaps, create walls to avoid hazards and line up ramps to perform devastating attacks and defeat enemies on your way to the next level.

Collect power-ups to transform Ben into your favourite Omniverse aliens, each with their own special abilities - Shocksquatch, Kickin Hawk, Ball Weevil, Crashhopper and now Alien X!

Features 4 chapters with locations from the Ben 10 universe and over 60 individual rooms giving hours of gameplay.

This game is available in the following languages: Arabic, English, French, Italian, Russian, Spanish (EU), Turkish, Spanish (LatAm), Portuguese (Brazilian)

What's New:

Can you handle the power of Alien X and travel between dimensions to save Bellwood City?
Help Ben by drawing his way through a brand new chapter.
The game now features more than 60 challenging rooms!

More info:
 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.turneremea.ben10cavernrun
